price: 至于归信而且行善者，将在一个胜地，感觉快乐；
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥ'barūna
